pages.text: Death happens to all of us, so if it happens to you, don't worry, it's not that big a deal. All your items are saved in a handy dandy grave right where you died.$(br2)You'll respawn with a $(item)Grave's Key$(), and the $(thing)Ghostly Shape$() Effect preventing monsters from seeing you. Simply return to the site of your demise, and use the $(item)Key$() to retrieve your items from the $(item)Tomb$().
Crafting your Key with a Potent or Apex Nacre Pearl will enable it to teleport you directly to your grave by holding Right Click.
